name: Heart Attack (itch) (lunchtime)
description:
This is a little game about protecting a heart from harm. 

Yes, one day good things will wither, 

all we can do is make the end come slower and the process last longer. 

You are the guardian, the roarer, the terminator of the long dark. 

Use WASD to move/ J to block.

When your heart beats so fast,use space to lower blood pressure back to normal,or the heart will explode(Gorgeously).

Hope you like our aesthetics and this little game.

 In addition, after playing once, Extra mode will be able, the sound effect will be changed.

这是一个关于保护一颗心不受伤害的小游戏，

是的，终有一日美好的事物会枯萎，

我们能做的只是让结束之时来得更慢，让进行之时持续更久，

你是守护者、怒吼者，是漫漫长夜的终结者。 

WASD进行移动/J键进行格挡/当你心跳过速的时候按空格降血压(否则会炸哦)。。

 希望大家喜欢我们的审美和游戏。 

另外，当游玩过一次后，可以开启Extra模式，音效会有所改变哦。
